product_name: REI Rainspout Rain Pants - Toddler Boys'
long_description: The PVC-free REI Rainspout rain pants will help keep your little one dry and comfortable during his puddle-jumping adventures. Sturdy, lightweight nylon sports a Durable Water Repellent coating; seams are sealed to block out rain and wind. Elastic waist with drawcord adjusts easily for a secure fit. Adjustable rip-and-stick cuff tabs help seal out the rain. Reflective accents enhance visibility in low light.
short_description: The PVC-free REI Rainspout rain pants will help keep your little one dry and comfortable during his puddle-jumping adventures.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Boys And Girls
